nodes.text: The Centurion-class battlecruiser was a class of battlecruiser that was active during the New Republic Era. Zeva Bliss, head of the Spice Runners of Kijimi in 18 ABY, used one such vessel as her flagship. The crime leader used it to transport her daughter Zorii Bliss and pilot Poe Dameron back to Kijimi.

A Centurion-class battlecruiser first appeared in canon in the 2020 novel Poe Dameron: Free Fall. The class originated in Star Wars Legends in the video game Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic II: The Sith Lords.
